sentences.sentence: His moral confusion and pretentiousness are reflected in his over-elaborate speech and style of writing.
sentences.translation: 他过于修饰的写作风格及学说，反映出他混淆道德又自命不凡。

sentences.sentence: The world will be able to feed on it for a thousand years to come. It is colossal in its pretentiousness. The thought of it almost shatters me.
sentences.translation: 世界将在未来一千年内依靠我们的书生存，它洋洋洒洒、无所不容，其思想差点儿叫我们茫然不知所措。

sentences.sentence: Actually, her blogs are boring. People like her because she is candid and doesn't have the pretentiousness that is typical of many other actresses.
sentences.translation: 其实，她的博客没有太大意思，我猜人们喜欢她是因为她率真，没有女演员的矫情。
